code:
---
title: MIP daemon
---
flowchart TB
    Start((Start))
    Init[Setup sockets, structures and accept connections]
    Unsent[Send messages waiting for arp response]
    Poll[Poll indefinitely]
    ReadyFd{Which fd?}
    RecvLower[Recieve from lower]
    SendUpper[Send packet from upper]
    RoutingUpper{Which routing type?}
    RResponse[Send first packet waiting for rout]
    ToBroadCast{Broadcast?}
    Broadcast[Broadcast packet]
    Forward{To me?}
    IsArp{Arp?}
    RecvArp[Store in cache, respond if request]
    SendUp[Send up to the proper type]
    Stored{Known interface+mac?}
    SendArp[Send arp, store message]

    Start --> Init --> Unsent --> Poll --> ReadyFd
    ReadyFd-- Lower -->RecvLower --> IsArp
        IsArp-- Yes -->RecvArp --> Unsent
        IsArp-- No --> ToBroadCast
    ReadyFd-- PING -->SendUpper
    ReadyFd-- ROUTING -->RoutingUpper
        RoutingUpper-- RESPONSE -->RResponse --> Unsent
        RoutingUpper-- UPDATE -->SendUpper
        RoutingUpper-- HELLO -->SendUpper
    SendUpper --> ToBroadCast
        ToBroadCast-- YES -->Broadcast -->Unsent
        ToBroadCast-- NO -->Forward
    Forward-- YES --> SendUp --> Unsent
    Forward-- NO -->Stored
        Stored-- YES -->Send --> Unsent
        Stored-- NO -->SendArp --> Unsent
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
